channel.title: Making it so it disconnects you when mass clicking on other players
channel.description:
I really need help on :Making it so it disconnects you when mass clicking on other players ;D This has been on my wish list for TOO long. And now, taking action ;)
-THX!

item.title: Making it so it disconnects you when mass clicking on other players
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

I did find a Tut on my Win 98SE that I found was deleted because he wouldn’t follow the format. Lol I still have the window open. I’ll just post it here, and PM him and see if I can get permission to post it in a Tut.

Here it is:

Declare these.

Code:
private int mouseClicks, mouseTimer;
Add these into case 241 for the packetType switch.

Code:
mouseClicks++;
Put this at the start of your process.

Code:
// Aftermath - This disconnects people for clicking too fast. 2/22/2007
// mouseClicks is incremented in case 241 of packetType, send on click.
if(–mouseTimer <= 0) {
mouseTimer = 20;
mouseClicks = 0;
} else if(mouseClicks > 10) {
System.out.println("Disconnected " + playerName + “: Clicking too fast.”);
disconnected = true;
}
Do not post anything about the format, do not ask for help with this. If you understand it, good for you. If you don’t, go learn Java.

By the way, if you have saving on your server, you might want to save the character before you disconnect it.

Credits: 99% AfterMath, 1% me for posting and keeping it open for 2 weeks

Read full topic

item.title: Making it so it disconnects you when mass clicking on other players
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

NO I looked everywhere for a tut, I can’t find one :(. I have been at it for hours. So if you every do find one, please, post a link. This is the main thing in my server i would like to fix.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2007, 10:30:16 AM[/size][hr]I knew u wouldnt find one, can someone simply post a little tut on it? should not be too difficult XD. Thx for your posts for help above though ^^^
